The local resident tried to "resolve" the issue with the border guard so that he would contribute to the illegal crossing of the state border for $ 2000 by providing information about the place of outfits.

About thisShe reported March 21State Border Service of Ukraine.

The border guard reported a bribery offer.

As a result of investigative actions, the briberyman was detained during the transfer of funds. The man was informed of the suspicion of committing a criminal offense, the liability for which is provided for in Part 3 of Article 369 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine "A proposal, promise or provision of undue benefit to an employee".

The Armyinform reportedwho detained a group of evastors who climbed through the fence near the border with Slovakia.
